Toons regularly ignore gravity (the 'running off the cliff shtick'), confuse illusions with reality (painting a tunnel on a wall shtick and making it real), moving at impossible speeds (ie Speedy Gonzalez or Road runner), survive being flattened into paste by heavy objects with little inconvenience, regularly can change appearance (the 'zipper gag' shtick), and of course can fit impossible things into small places (like pulling huge mallets out of tiny handbags or swallowing huge items with barely a bulge showing), not to mention dozens of other impossible things they can do.

Could it be possible that any of those work for you now? Could you be effectively invulnerable? Defy gravity? Be a real quick change artist? Hmm, if it DOES work it'd be dependent on Toon laws of Physics. Things only seem to work if it seems... well, either funny or 'right'. Like it was meant to happen in the script? Hmm, you aren't really sure of the details but you should try things out at least. You might only look like Jessica, you might not be able to do any of that stuff... or only some of it.
14131112.title: Examining possibilities.

choices: Maybe painting things real? Or perhaps Jessica's super sex appeal?
Could try the Zipper gag, or maybe the huge things in small packages?
141311122.content:
It takes quite a few goes standing on the bed, attempting to look straight ahead and walk off the bed, but finally... you look down to find yourself in midair and just can't help yourself. You smile up at yourself in the mirror and give a faint wave, just before falling to the floor. Heh, maybe it only worked because you were about to do the wave at the end to make it funny? You aren't sure. You pick yourself up, rubbing a bruised butt, and wonder what you could try next?

Painting something and trying to make it real? Hmm, might be dangerous if it even works. Plus you aren't the worlds best artist! Maybe art ability comes with the Jessica character? Who knows!

The idea of finding a heavy weight and dropping it on yourself to see if you survive and end up as a human pancake is not one you want to attempt really, but you guess it's an option. Maybe next year sometime.

Super abilities like speed that some cartoons do usually are to do with their characters. You doubt you could emulate the Road Runner, but maybe you can come up with something suitable for your Jessica alter ego? What... hmm, you can't sing, but she could. Not sure that really qualifies as a toon power exactly. Maybe sex appeal? In the movie she certainly had guys falling for. Well, mostly Roger, but still... worth thinking about.

The zipper gag is definitely something you might be interested in. Then you could literally pull down a zipper and unfold your current skin to reveal whatever you wanted yourself to look like inside. Presto chango! Hmm, you have no clue how to choose what your new form would be even if you could get it to work. Guess just try to focus on an image before you try it?

Lastly, fitting big things into small places. Heh, girls in cartoons often fit giant mallets into their cleavage (OK, that's mostly Anime!), or eat huge meals, or even people, with no sign of them after they're inside. Could you do that?

You ponder the possibilities and try to decide.
141311122.title: Totally Toon.

1413111221.content: Well, you still aren't sure about your skill with a paint brush. On the other hand you really aren't into boys either, even as Jessica... though you could try to see if her sex appeal works on girls? Lesbians anyone?
1413111221.title: Decisions decisions. Paint or sex?

1413111222.content:
The Zipper Gag is one you definitely want to try if you can find out how to pick who you turn into... then again, if you do that could you even take the mask off afterwards? Maybe that would stick it till you put the original 'Jessica' suit back on? Who knows?

The fitting huge things into tiny spaces is also interesting. Yes, handbags and cleavage is interesting, but there is also the aforementioned mouth, and also other body openings. Oh the possibilities!
1413111222.title: Decisions decisions. Zipper or swallow?

choices: what seems to be the usual you.
14131112221.content:
Well, you could just as well be another toon in a perfect Jessica Rabbit suit as Jessica herself, so you decide to try the Zipper Gag. Now, where to feel for a concealed zipper pull? The comic effect might be maximized if your zipper runs from the center of your hairline to your crotch, but it would be a nicely balanced mixture of comical and creepy if it started under your chin and you had to pull off a full Jessica head to reveal the toon beneath. You make sure your clothes and hair are in place -- the Zipper Gag looks best if the toon is perfectly his or her usual self to look at -- and started to feel under your chin with your gloved fingertips. The gloves are so much a part of being your Jessica Rabbit self that they don't blunt your sense of touch in the least.

There's an unexpected twinge of pain as the zipper pull pops out of the perfect skin between your chin and your neck, and you give a sexy little gasp. Suddenly you don't want to stop being Jessica Rabbit, but you grasp the zipper pull with your gloved left hand and unzip skin and dress to almost your crotch. You're someone else in a Jessica suit now. With hands gloved with that suit, you pull the elastic and hollow Jessica head off, revealing:
14131112221.title: Zipper Gag.

info.brief_description: white mask + a person = mask of said person
info.description:
one day you are looking through your room and find a strange box labeled to you from you birth parents . you open it to find a white plastic mask with a note stating once put on a another person it will absorb said person and create a mask of the person that will transform you into them.
the mask can also bend reality to be used on fictional characters for you to change into.
main characters: you-current age 17 and adopted by your current family at age 5 the same year you Jenna had out of collage and Married Dan. an average intelligence and very hormonal right now but holds it in with out showing it.
Jenna Martian- your mom age 35, has long red hair with green eyes and an hourglass figure with a sizable ee cup breasts. she is also considered a genus finishing collage at the age of 18
Dan Martian-you dad age 39, has brown hair with grey eyes and is would renown inventor/ genus
Sarah Martian-your 14 year old sister, blond hair with blue eyes and an hourglass figure with dd cup breasts borderline e cups. she is an avrage intelligence with a bubbly personality
Carly Martian- your 5 year old sister, red hair with grey eyes and she takes after you parents in their intelligence but stays back to get some more time to mature.
more characters will be added depending on the chapters that are added so add if you want
